alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 30 at 2:38AM MDT until March 30 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County, East Platte County and North Snowy Range Foothills. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; North Snowy Range Foothills
